Version 2.0.81 - Refactor lib.php into Modular Class Files

Architecture Improvements

  • Extracted lib.php (4,726 lines) into 6 modular class files under classes/
  • lib.php is now ~230 lines of thin delegator functions
  • No functionality changes — all code preserved, just reorganized

New Files

  • classes/hooks/webservice_hooks.php — Web service pre/post processing
  • classes/hooks/navigation_hooks.php — Navigation menu and post-install redirect
  • classes/hooks/navbar_hooks.php — Boost navbar icon rendering
  • classes/scorm/tracking_js.php — SCORM real-time position tracking JavaScript
  • classes/scorm/embed_assets.php — Embed mode CSS and JavaScript
  • classes/scorm/slidecount.php — SCORM slide count detection

Previous Versions

  • v2.0.80: Fix position bar showing furthest instead of current slide
  • v2.0.79: Fix DOM observer picking up post-intercept boosted values as navigation
  • v2.0.78: Fix re-entrant LMSSetValue processing modified suspend_data as navigation
